        public void setImportantThing(java.lang.String teamA,
                              java.lang.String teamB,
                              boolean betOnA,
                              float moneyBet,
                              int oddsA)
        Sets the teams, the bet, the money and the odds of team A
        Parameters:
        teamA - teamA
        teamB - teamB
        betOnA - determines if you bet on A or B
        moneyBet - the amount you bet
        oddsA - the odds of A (odds of B=100-oddsA)
